2002.description: A great shaft runs up the center of the spire. Souls cling to its sides, turning wheels with their limbs. You can go no further without ascending again.

2003.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2003.description: You stand before an ever-turning platform-one of the gears that powers this hellish device.

2004.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2004.description: In the distance, you see the massive face of the clock tower. Moonlight glows through it, pale and ghostly.

2005.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2005.description: The relentless grinding of gears fills the air with a deafening roar.

2006.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2006.description: A metal walkway, patched together with wooden planks and old chains, sways with every uncertain step.

2007.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2007.description: Makeshift walls surround you, cobbled together from layers of pasted-over newspaper.

2008.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2008.description: A cold breeze brushes past you, clutching at your soul for a fleeting moment.

2009.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2009.description: A narrow passage guides you between massive, turning gears. One wrong step could cost you everything.

2010.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2010.description: Every few moments, a wall of steam bursts forth, blocking your path and scalding the air.

2011.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2011.description: You reach an open drop-this section of the path has rusted away into nothingness.

2012.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2012.description: Pale moonlight streams in through the broken clock face. Silence surrounds you, heavy and complete.

2013.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2013.description: The wind howls through the spire, and you can't help but wonder what lies ahead.

2014.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2014.description: You cross barren pits and shifting gears, each step a gamble against gravity.

2015.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2015.description: Stone pillars wrapped in cobwebs support the ceiling, barely keeping the structure from collapse.

2016.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2016.description: The walkway ahead is too dangerous to cross. Beyond it, only darkness waits.

2017.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2017.description: Bright lights begin to flicker from somewhere below. Whatever's causing it-it's coming, and not for just anyone.

2018.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2018.description: An old, rusted staircase spirals downward, leading you deeper into the unknown.

2019.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2019.description: You reach the top of the spire and feel a surge of power in the air, like a storm waiting to break.

2020.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2020.description: Before you, a storm brews within the tower itself-unnatural, caged, and seething with energy.

2021.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2021.description: Sitting behind an ancient workbench is the GRAND CARETAKER of the clock tower, watching you silently.

2022.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2022.description: You find piles of rusted metal and rotting wood-discarded remnants of everything this place has consumed.

2023.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2023.description: You stand before a vast lookout, offering a glimpse of all that awaits you far below.

2024.title: The Time Wound Spire Level 3
2024.description: Out of the darkness rises a great ARCHWAY-a possible exit, though where it leads is anyone's guess.

2025.title: Draemyr's Rest
2025.description: You are engulfed by a shivering cold so deep it nearly steals your breath away.

2026.title: Draemyr's Rest
2026.description: With snow knee-deep around you, you wander this cold, dark place. The flicker of your lantern is the only light that remains.

2027.title: Draemyr's Rest
2027.description: Old, dead trees litter the landscape as you battle a wind that seems determined to push you back.

2028.title: Draemyr's Rest
2028.description: A shrill scream pierces the night-the cry of a banshee-as the moon slips free from behind the clouds.

2029.title: Draemyr's Rest
2029.description: Far in the distance, you spot a fire burning bright-a small beacon of life in an otherwise lifeless world.

2030.title: Draemyr's Rest
2030.description: Every step you take fills the silence with the crunch of snow, as the wind howls around you like a voice begging you to turn back.

2031.title: Draemyr's Rest
2031.description: You stand at the edge of a cliff that looks out over a sea of untouched, wind-carved snow.

2032.title: Draemyr's Rest
2032.description: You breathe a quiet sigh of relief as you find yourself on a traveled road, the snow there flattened by past footsteps.

2033.title: Draemyr's Rest
2033.description: After what feels like a lifetime in the cold, your clothes are stiff-frozen solid and heavy upon your frame.

2034.title: Draemyr's Rest
2034.description: And there it is-the entrance to the village. The soft glow of firelight and a whisper of warmth make you feel, if only for a moment, alive again.

2035.title: Draemyr's Rest
2035.description: From somewhere above, you sense you're being watched while wandering this nearly abandoned place.

2036.title: Draemyr's Rest
2036.description: You search for an inn-a place to rest your weary body-even as the cold continues to drain the life from your limbs.

2037.title: Draemyr's Rest
2037.description: An old church stands before you, its wooden doors crooked on rusted hinges. Above them, a silver cross gleams faintly in the moonlight.

2038.title: Draemyr's Rest
2038.description: You pull open the wooden doors, the sound of rusted hinges creaking sharply through the still air.

2039.title: Draemyr's Rest
2039.description: Old pews are spaced evenly, all facing the altar where the priest once spoke to those who believed.

2040.title: Draemyr's Rest
2040.description: A wall of candles flickers softly, some already lit, others still being tended by the humble PRIEST who toils in silence.

2041.title: Draemyr's Rest
2041.description: Old shops are boarded up for the night, their chimneys exhaling gentle streams of smoke into the cold evening sky.

2042.title: Draemyr's Rest
2042.description: You walk past a stable, and for a moment, you swear you hear voices-but when you stop to listen, there's only silence.

2043.title: Draemyr's Rest
2043.description: Continuing along the snow-covered path, you soon come upon a large stone building. Lanterns hang from its eaves, swaying in the breeze, their flames flickering weakly.

2044.title: Draemyr's Rest
2044.description: You pull open one of the heavy doors and step inside. The warmth hits you instantly-but you have no idea what you'll find within.

2045.title: Draemyr's Rest
2045.description: A large wooden table sits in the center of the room-a place where guests are greeted, stories shared, and secrets kept.

2046.title: Draemyr's Rest
2046.description: Old shields hang from the walls, and tattered pelts from long-forgotten beasts rest across the floor like discarded memories.

2047.title: Draemyr's Rest
2047.description: "Stop right there. Lord Vaereth Duskthorn wishes to speak with you, adventurer. Head on in." - A guard steps forward from the shadows, his voice sharp and commanding.

2048.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2048.description: You find yourself standing at the main entrance of the manor. Torches hang from the walls, filling the space with a warm, flickering glow.

2049.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2049.description: Old portraits hang along the walls, their faces dancing in the torchlight. An uneasy sense of safety creeps in with every flicker.

2050.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2050.description: Nobody around. Nothing but silence... and darkness.

2051.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2051.description: Empty chairs are spaced along the bare wooden wall, untouched and still.

2052.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2052.description: There, sitting alone upon a throne with firelight casting long shadows, is LORD VAERETH-lost in deep thought.

2053.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2053.description: You turn a narrow corner and enter a small storage room cluttered with crates and barrels.

2054.title: Lord Vaereth's Manor
2054.description: A frost-covered door separates the manor's warmth from the cold breath of the outside world.

2055.title: Miner's Ascent
2055.description: The bitter wind cuts through your bones as you follow a narrow path carved through ice and snow.

2056.title: Miner's Ascent
2056.description: Tall trees sway in the wind as an uneasy feeling settles over you.

2057.title: Miner's Ascent
2057.description: With every step, you begin to reconsider leaving the warmth of the manor behind.

2058.title: Miner's Ascent
2058.description: The trail begins to slope upward. You hold your lantern out, its light fighting against the dark.

2059.title: Miner's Ascent
2059.description: From the bitter darkness, a wagon comes into view-toppled on its side, tangled in webbing, with the withered remains of a body inside.

2060.title: Miner's Ascent
2060.description: You stand before the gaping mouth of the mine. Not a soul in sight. Something grim lies ahead-you can feel it.

2061.title: Iron Hold Mine
2061.description: You pause and hold your breath, straining to catch even the faintest sign of life.

2062.title: Iron Hold Mine
2062.description: The deeper you wander into the mine, the warmer it becomes. Soon, you begin to see signs of something unholy at work.

2063.title: Iron Hold Mine
2063.description: The mine floor descends deep into the earth. You arrive at a wooden platform with a staircase that vanishes into the darkness below.

2064.title: Iron Hold Mine
2064.description: You wait a moment and call out into the abyss. No reply. Only silence greets you.

2065.title: Iron Hold Mine
2065.description: You step into the dark abyss, unsure of what horrors lie ahead.

2066.title: Iron Hold Mine
2066.description: With all your strength, you push through the creeping fear clawing at your mind.

2067.title: Iron Hold Mine
2067.description: The temperature begins to rise. The old mine walls are scarred with pickaxe marks-testaments to desperate labor.

2068.title: Iron Hold Mine
2068.description: A narrow passage leads to a small storage room, filled with empty crates and shattered barrels.

2069.title: Iron Hold Mine
2069.description: A sickness churns in your stomach, knowing each step forward could be your last.

2070.title: Iron Hold Mine
2070.description: A dead end. Just a wall of cold rock. Outside, the wind howls beyond your reach.

2071.title: Iron Hold Mine
2071.description: You move slowly into the suffocating darkness. The silence presses in like a weight.

2072.title: Iron Hold Mine
2072.description: A strange odor clings to the air as you descend deeper into the earth.

2073.title: Iron Hold Mine
2073.description: You pause, wondering what grim tale unfolded in this forsaken tomb.

2074.title: Iron Hold Mine
2074.description: Dust-covered wooden columns rise from the ground, their surfaces choked in ancient cobwebs.

2075.title: Iron Hold Mine
2075.description: A rotting table bears the remnants of the miners' final meal, long overtaken by mold and decay.

2076.title: Iron Hold Mine
2076.description: You peer into the distance, but see only an overwhelming void.

2077.title: Iron Hold Mine
2077.description: The stench of death and rot grips your senses, tying your stomach in knots.

2078.title: Iron Hold Mine
2078.description: Caught in a thick web, the shriveled corpse of a MINER dangles silently-an echo of what waits for the unprepared.

2079.title: Iron Hold Mine
2079.description: You breathe a heavy sigh of relief-only to find another dead end.

2080.title: Iron Hold Mine
2080.description: You freeze. The metallic clang of something striking rock rings out in the dark.

2081.title: Iron Hold Mine
2081.description: With each cautious step, you wander deeper into this forsaken place.

2082.title: Iron Hold Mine
2082.description: As the heat intensifies, the ceilings above become thick with webs-tangled and swaying.

2083.title: Iron Hold Mine
2083.description: A raspy voice calls to you from the shadows, urging you to come just a little bit closer.

2084.title: Iron Hold Mine
2084.description: Standing motionless in the shadows, face hidden by grime and grief, is a lone MINER.

2085.title: Iron Hold Mine
2085.description: You follow a narrow passageway-hidden from sight unless one knew to look.

2086.title: Iron Hold Mine
2086.description: An old mine cart with its wheels removed sits abandoned, blocking your path like a tombstone.

2087.title: Iron Hold Mine
2087.description: Water drips from above, echoing into the puddles that gather across the uneven floor.

2088.title: Iron Hold Mine
2088.description: In the distance, something-or someone-scuttles back into the dark.

2089.title: Iron Hold Mine
2089.description: Piles of discarded ore litter the path as you press deeper into the gloom.

2090.title: Iron Hold Mine
2090.description: A strange aroma fills the air, as if something is cooking over a fire… but who could be left to cook?

2091.title: Iron Hold Mine
2091.description: Empty bunk beds are scattered throughout the chamber, cold and still.

2092.title: Iron Hold Mine
2092.description: The wailing of someone in pain-no, madness-echoes from deeper within.

2093.title: Iron Hold Mine
2093.description: The walls glisten with a grotesque mixture of spiderwebs and a slick, unearthly slime.

2094.title: Iron Hold Mine
2094.description: Your path is severed where the floor has collapsed into a gaping pit. It descends into a black void that promises certain death.

2095.title: Iron Hold Mine
2095.description: The mine shaft angles downward, taking you deeper into the bowels of the earth.

2096.title: Iron Hold Mine
2096.description: You pause. Something unseen is watching you. You can feel its gaze.

2097.title: Iron Hold Mine
2097.description: You pass abandoned mine carts and strange piles of ore, untouched in years.

2098.title: Iron Hold Mine
2098.description: Your breath catches. Mortified faces stare up from lifeless bodies-drained of all they once were.

2099.title: Iron Hold Mine
2099.description: You stand at the mouth of a massive chamber, an underground world carved by the greed and hands of miners long gone.

2100.title: Iron Hold Mine
2100.description: The ground trembles beneath your feet. From the cracked stone walls, things begin to stir-creatures coming to life.

2101.title: Iron Hold Mine
2101.description: As you wander this underground coffin of the damned, a strange, disquieting feeling overtakes you.

2102.title: Iron Hold Mine
2102.description: Bones, stripped of flesh, lie scattered around you. The stench alone brings bile to your throat.

2103.title: Iron Hold Mine
2103.description: Before you lies a large pile of ore-meant to be taken to the surface, now just a grim monument to unchecked greed.

2104.title: Iron Hold Mine
2104.description: For a moment, you wonder-how many souls have vanished into the black, snatched by creatures unseen? How many names were never spoken again?

2105.title: Iron Hold Mine
2105.description: The walls are etched with the crude CARVINGS of desperate workers. Not art-warnings. Stories. A record of suffering carved in panic and soot.

2106.title: Iron Hold Mine
2106.description: Splintered furniture and shattered crates clutter the floor. Every step forward feels like entering the belly of a beast that's long since digested hope.

2107.title: Iron Hold Mine
2107.description: You freeze. Along the edges of the tunnel, mummified remains rest in unnatural stillness-kept, not buried.

2108.title: Iron Hold Mine
2108.description: From somewhere in the distance, a scream. Not just pain-pleading. A miner's LAST WORDS, drawn out into a cry for mercy.

2109.title: Iron Hold Mine
2109.description: A hiss. Faint. Slithering on the edge of hearing. Your skin prickles as your mind races to assign shape to the sound.

2110.title: Iron Hold Mine
2110.description: Sword drawn, lantern raised-you walk the winding path. The shadows dance, but none of them feel entirely your own.

2111.title: Iron Hold Mine
2111.description: A woman's voice calls out, bright and welcoming. But beneath the joy, you hear something else: devotion. She says her master is near.

2112.title: Iron Hold Mine
2112.description: The floor gives way beneath your feet-you crash down, coughing in a cloud of dust. Your hands press against a slick, wet stone.

2113.title: Iron Hold Mine
2113.description: As the haze clears, your breath catches. Before you stands a forgotten temple, its entrance gaping like the mouth of a god abandoned and starved.

2114.title: Iron Hold Mine
2114.description: Statues line the chamber-creatures no human eye has seen for millennia. Their gaze pierces you as if they remember your kind, and pity you.

2115.title: Iron Hold Mine
2115.description: A woman spins wildly in the dust, calling out for her masters. Her eyes shimmer with madness. She believes you're part of the summoning.

2116.title: Iron Hold Mine
2116.description: Dried blood paints the floor. The scent of rot still lingers, as though death itself refused to leave.

2117.title: Iron Hold Mine
2117.description: You recoil. Corpses line the room-posed like merchants, customers, and children. As if a marketplace had been frozen in the moment of annihilation.

2118.title: Iron Hold Mine
2118.description: Thick WEBBING blocks your way. As you slice through it, a twisted voice shrieks from beyond: a soul driven to madness, invoking the gods against you.

2119.title: Iron Hold Mine
2119.description: A makeshift barrier seals off the tunnel. On it, scrawled in trembling red: HELP.

2120.title: Iron Hold Mine
2120.description: The walls here are scarred and silent, carved by hands long since claimed by the dark. There's nothing but ruin in this hollow stretch of the mine-just stone, dust, and the feeling that something once lived here...and died remembering it.

2121.title: Iron Hold Mine
2121.description: A home-if it can be called that. A hay-filled bed. A crude table. No sign of life, but signs of survival long after hope died.

2122.title: Iron Hold Mine
2122.description: He stands there-a MINER, blinking at you in disbelief. For one beautiful second, joy washes over his face. He thought he'd die alone.

2123.title: Iron Hold Mine
2123.description: You move slowly, cautiously-each step calculated to avoid the bloodstains that streak the floor like torn silk. The darkness seems to press in, hungry.

2124.title: Iron Hold Mine
2124.description: The air is thick, the stench of decay choking. From somewhere ahead, the tortured wail of a soul not yet released from its suffering pierces your senses.

2125.title: Iron Hold Mine
2125.description: The walls are veiled in cobwebs, thick as drapes. Your lantern flickers wildly-and for a moment, the web appears to breathe.

2126.title: Iron Hold Mine
2126.description: Vast piles of rock and forgotten tools lie in the center of a broad chamber. Everything here feels untouched, not by time-but by fear.

2127.title: Iron Hold Mine
2127.description: Before you stretches a narrow tunnel. Veins of ore shimmer like pulsing wounds beneath your lantern's glow, tracing paths older than memory.

2128.title: Iron Hold Mine
2128.description: The dead speak-not with mouths, but with longing. Their voices seep from the stone, begging you to stay. But you are not ready to lie down.

2129.title: Iron Hold Mine
2129.description: A brittle wooden walkway creaks underfoot, spanning a shaft that disappears into darkness. You cannot see the bottom, but you feel it watching.

2130.title: Iron Hold Mine
2130.description: You stop. The horror hits all at once. Bones, blood, shreds of clothing-an entire chapter of life ended in this room, violently and without mercy.

2131.title: Iron Hold Mine
2131.description: COCOONS cover the walls-swollen, silent. Each one was once a miner. Now, they're just vessels, waiting to be forgotten.

2132.title: Iron Hold Mine
2132.description: In the far distance, something reflects your light-eight gleaming orbs, cold and calculating. They do not blink. They do not move.

2133.title: Iron Hold Mine
2133.description: No blood. No bodies. Only chisel marks-a record of hands that once dreamed of escape, scratched into stone like a prayer no god answered.

2134.title: Iron Hold Mine
2134.description: You spin, instinct guiding your hand. Blade raised just in time as it emerges-an ICE SPIDER, enormous and glistening, its limbs clicking like bone on bone.

2135.title: Iron Hold Mine
2135.description: Laughter echoes faintly, interwoven with the sound of distant singing.

2136.title: Iron Hold Mine
2136.description: Everything around you blends into the last, a confusing mess, as if the earth itself were trying to mislead you.

2137.title: Iron Hold Mine
2137.description: You spot a wandering OLD WOMAN, muttering to herself in a voice lost to time.

2138.title: Iron Hold Mine
2138.description: The ground trembles beneath your feet, pulsing like something alive, waiting to feed again.

2139.title: Iron Hold Mine
2139.description: You slowly descend deeper into the earth, unsure of what horrors await.

2140.title: Iron Hold Mine
2140.description: You step onto a wooden platform, swaying slightly. Its timbers are cracked and ancient with age.

2141.title: Iron Hold Mine
2141.description: With every cautious step, the platform creaks and sways beneath your weight.

2142.title: Iron Hold Mine
2142.description: The ground is littered with clothes and dishes, abandoned in what seems like a frantic escape.

2143.title: Iron Hold Mine
2143.description: You stand in silence, bearing witness to the destruction that befell this place.

2144.title: Iron Hold Mine
2144.description: In the distance, webs sway gently, almost as if they're calling your name.

2145.title: Iron Hold Mine
2145.description: A foul stench clings to the air, and the flickering glow of a small fire catches your eye.

2146.title: Iron Hold Mine
2146.description: To your surprise, you're greeted by a MINER, hunched over a crude meal.

2147.title: Iron Hold Mine
2147.description: Corpses, brutally slaughtered, are stacked in unsettlingly neat piles.

2148.title: Iron Hold Mine
2148.description: The walls are smeared with blood, rambling WRITINGS scrawled in madness.

2149.title: Iron Hold Mine
2149.description: Tiny spiders scatter back into the darkness. Judging by their size, they've only just hatched.

2150.title: Iron Hold Mine
2150.description: This hollow chamber is void of life, a dark, forgotten place within the world.

2151.title: Iron Hold Mine
2151.description: Dust-covered beds line the room, undisturbed for what must be years.

2152.title: Iron Hold Mine
2152.description: Plates and cups are neatly set, awaiting a meal that will never come.

2153.title: Iron Hold Mine
2153.description: Carefully, you enter a tunnel that seems to twist endlessly into the unknown.

2154.title: Iron Hold Mine
2154.description: Above you, the sound of rushing water thunders from unseen currents.

2155.title: Iron Hold Mine
2155.description: Drops of water fall from the ceiling, echoing as they land in shallow puddles below.

2156.title: Iron Hold Mine
2156.description: A sudden chill brushes past you, a breeze drifting in from the unseen depths.

2157.title: Iron Hold Mine
2157.description: From the darkness ahead, a faint shimmer of light flickers, hope, or a cruel illusion.

2158.title: Iron Hold Mine
2158.description: Somewhere close, you hear it, deep, heavy breathing, slow and deliberate.

2159.title: Iron Hold Mine
2159.description: Bones lay scattered across the floor, tangled in web-covered rocks, the remnants of past victims.

2160.title: Iron Hold Mine
2160.description: There, torn and lifeless, lies the ICE SPIDER QUEEN. But someone else is here, watching from the shadows.

2161.title: Iron Hold Mine
2161.description: Slumped against the wall, bloodied and breathless, is a man clad in makeshift armor. He raises his head, offers a faint smile, and says, "The name's THARREK."

2162.title: The Wound of Earth
2162.description: You feel the cold night air wrap around you like a blanket. For the first time in a long while, you let out a quiet sigh of relief.

2163.title: The Wound of Earth
2163.description: Gently, you push aside the brush and tangled branches, revealing the hush of night and the open sky beyond.

2164.title: The Wound of Earth
2164.description: With one last step, you emerge from the thicket and stand before a winding path that vanishes into the unknown.

2165.title: The Wound of Earth
2165.description: You move silently, your feet falling on a path carved long ago into the earth, forgotten, but still here.

2166.title: The Wound of Earth
2166.description: From somewhere in the distance, crickets sing their ancient song beneath the stars.

2167.title: The Wound of Earth
2167.description: A soft shimmer catches your eye, a small pond, still and glassy, reflecting the warm glow of the moon.

2168.title: The Wound of Earth
2168.description: You can hardly believe what you've stumbled upon, a quiet place, hidden and untouched, where silence reigns.

2169.title: The Wound of Earth
2169.description: For the briefest moment, you feel safe. No beasts to slay. No horrors in the dark. Just calm.

2170.title: The Wound of Earth
2170.description: Yet from within the stillness, the pond's surface almost calls to you, as if inviting you closer.

2171.title: The Wound of Earth
2171.description: A soft voice, warm, feminine, unseen, welcomes you. It stops you cold in your tracks.

2172.title: The Wound of Earth
2172.description: The path begins to twist and bend, guiding you deeper into the woods, deeper into shadow.

2173.title: The Wound of Earth
2173.description: You pause to overlook the pond. A strange peace washes over you, lulling your senses.

2174.title: The Wound of Earth
2174.description: The stale scent of mud and stagnant water lingers in the air, grounding you in a moment you can't quite explain.

2175.title: The Wound of Earth
2175.description: Silence. All around you, absolute silence. It feels like you could drop your guard, if only for a heartbeat.

2176.title: The Wound of Earth
2176.description: Then, the sharp cry of a wolf echoes through the trees, splitting the stillness and sending a shiver up your spine.

2177.title: The Wound of Earth
2177.description: From the mud, something rises, a hunched figure of twisted flesh and bent limbs. An ancient abomination, nearly extinct, known only as a FROGMAN.

2178.title: The Wound of Earth
2178.description: Dozens of glowing eyes blink open across the water's edge. You are not alone. Something more is waking.

2179.title: The Wound of Earth
2179.description: You hold your breath and press forward, each step heavier than the last, as you wonder what other nightmares may yet emerge.

2180.title: The Wound of Earth
2180.description: You step into a small clearing, and the sudden cold brushes against your skin like a long-forgotten memory.

2181.title: The Wound of Earth
2181.description: Only the flickering flame of your lantern leads you now, swaying gently as it casts uncertain shadows.

2182.title: The Wound of Earth
2182.description: There is nothing but darkness, and the steady chorus of crickets playing their eternal song beneath the night.

2183.title: The Wound of Earth
2183.description: The ground shifts unevenly beneath your feet. An earthy scent rises in the air, damp, old. Then you see it: a single GRAVSTONE, half-swallowed by the weeds.

2184.title: The Wound of Earth
2184.description: From beyond the veil of trees, you hear soft weeping. A woman's voice, fragile, grieving, reaches out. The WIDOW mourns, though her face remains unseen.

2185.title: The Wound of Earth
2185.description: The path begins to descend into what was once a farmer's field, now overtaken by time and silence.

2186.title: The Wound of Earth
2186.description: Broken wooden fences stretch out along the trail, rotting where they stood, once meant to pen in livestock...or perhaps keep something out.

2187.title: The Wound of Earth
2187.description: Time passes strangely here. You walk on, but see no one. Only the breeze and your breath to keep you company.

2188.title: The Wound of Earth
2188.description: Far ahead, framed by shadow, you glimpse the shape of a small farmhouse. It stands alone, wrapped in silence and swallowed by the dark.

2189.title: Duskwither's Farm
2189.description: You wander onto an old, forgotten trail. The cold darkness grips you tightly, refusing to let go.

2190.title: Duskwither's Farm
2190.description: Everything around you is swallowed in silence. The black stillness feels endless.

2191.title: Duskwither's Farm
2191.description: The clouds part across the night sky, revealing the pale, ghostly glow of the moon.

2192.title: Duskwither's Farm
2192.description: You stop for a moment, your eyes drawn to the silhouette of a large farmhouse, standing solid through the passing of generations.

2193.title: Duskwither's Farm
2193.description: The front door creaks open and shut slowly, as if moved by a faint, unseen wind.

2194.title: Duskwither's Farm
2194.description: You stand before the weathered farmhouse. Everything has been left untouched for decades.

2195.title: Duskwither's Farm
2195.description: Dust clings to the walls. Old portraits hang crooked, their faces blurred by time.

2196.title: Duskwither's Farm
2196.description: The furniture remains where it was last placed, as if frozen in time. Its owners, long since gone.

2197.title: Duskwither's Farm
2197.description: Strange symbols are painted across the floor and walls. A creeping unease crawls down your spine.

2198.title: Duskwither's Farm
2198.description: The stench of death chokes the air. Decaying, unrecognizable bodies lie strewn across the floor.

2199.title: Duskwither's Farm
2199.description: A faded family portrait hangs crooked on the wall. Outside, the wind howls. You suddenly feel watched.

2200.title: Duskwither's Farm
2200.description: Laughter echoes from nowhere. You hear the voice of a woman speaking to someone unseen.

2201.title: Duskwither's Farm
2201.description: Piles of old books clutter the room. From afar, you catch the flicker of a solitary flame.

2202.title: Duskwither's Farm
2202.description: A blinding light surrounds you. Somewhere nearby, someone mutters to themselves in a trembling voice.

2203.title: Duskwither's Farm
2203.description: A circle drawn in blood lies in the center of the room. Inside it, the lifeless body of a GOAT.

2204.title: Duskwither's Farm
2204.description: Seated on a small wooden stool, blood-stained hands cradling a doll, sits the WITCH. She does not move.

2205.title: Duskwither's Farm
2205.description: A DOOR, nailed shut with rotting boards. For a brief moment, something scratches from the other side.

2206.title: Duskwither's Farm
2206.description: You hold your breath as you pass the rotting remains of cows. The stench of decay is unbearable.

2207.title: Duskwither's Farm
2207.description: What was once fertile ground is now barren. The wheat crops have long since withered to dust.

2208.title: Duskwither's Farm
2208.description: All around are the scars of her curse, a land poisoned by the witch’s hatred and sorrow.

2209.title: Duskwither's Farm
2209.description: A narrow bridge stretches across a dried-up riverbed. The wind moans beneath the brittle planks.

2210.title: Duskwither's Farm
2210.description: You walk past crumbling remnants of forgotten buildings, slowly being reclaimed by the earth.

2211.title: Duskwither's Farm
2211.description: An old stone well stands before you. A wooden bucket rests atop its edge, untouched for years.

2212.title: Duskwither's Farm
2212.description: You face a vast expanse beyond. Only a worn path lies ahead, leading into the unknown.
